text:
On Memorial Day weekend, major stores launch blowouts with deep discounts on everything from clothing to foam mattresses. (Getty Images)

With Memorial Day weekend imminent, you're probably crossing your fingers for warm weather, clear skies and fantastic sales from your favorite retailers.

Happily, Memorial Day sales seldom disappoint. Every May, major stores launch blowouts with deep discounts on everything from foam mattresses to table saws. Sales seem to start earlier and earlier every year, and this year, many Memorial Day savings events started popping up in early May. To help you stay on top of the best deals, here's a guide to the year's top Memorial Day sales.

Home Depot

May 18 to June 7

With deep discounts across many categories, Home Depot's Memorial Day event is one of the retailer's best sales of the year. This year, the store will offer the following deals:

Up to 40 percent off select refrigerators.

Up to 40 percent off select washer and dryers

Up to 35 percent off select cooking appliances.

Up to 30 percent off select microwaves.

Up to 30 percent off select dishwashers.

Up to 40 percent off select floor-care appliances.

Up to 40 percent off select laundry pairs.

Up to 40 percent off select kitchen packages.

Up to 30 percent off patio furniture and accessories.

Up to 15 percent off grills and smokers.

$10 off select 1-gallon paint cans.

$40 off 5-gallon buckets.

Best Buy

May 23 to May 30

Best Buy is hosting a major Memorial Day sale, with special offers on appliances, tech and more. Noteworthy promotions include:

Up to $500 off 4K Ultra HDTVs, HDTVs and other home theater products.

Up to $200 off select MacBook models.

Up to $100 off select HP computers.

Up to 35 percent off select refrigerators.

Up to 35 percent off select washers and dryers.

Up to 25 percent off select ranges.

Sears

May 23 to June 4

Like Home Depot and Best Buy, Sears is offering hefty discounts on major appliances, plus solid deals across a variety of categories. Noteworthy offers include:

Up to 40 percent off major appliances.

25 to 50 percent off select washers and dryers.

Up to 60 percent off top-brand mattresses.

Up to 50 percent off patio furniture.

Up to 40 percent off trampolines and swing sets.

Up to 50 percent off tools.

Up to 30 percent off small kitchen appliances.

Up to 30 percent off dining sets.

30 percent off or more on fitness equipment and weights.

Up to 30 percent off tents.

Up to 50 percent off camping chairs and tables.

20 percent off $50, or 15 percent off up to $49.99, on apparel and accessories.

Macy's

May 24 to May 29

In honor of Memorial Day, Macy's is slashing prices storewide. The massive sale will feature savings across all categories, including:

Extra 20 percent off select sale apparel and accessories.

Extra 20 percent off select regular-price and sale lingerie.

30 to 55 percent off swimwear, summer apparel and beach accessories.

40 to 60 percent off suiting and dress shirts.

40 to 50 percent off kids summer apparel.

30 to 55 percent off barbecue and outdoor entertainment gear.

30 percent off backpacks.

Buy one, get one bath towels and bath rugs.

50 to 60 percent off comforters.

40 percent off all memory foam toppers.

Buy one, get one free pillows.

Queen mattresses and mattress sets starting at $149.

Extra 10 percent off select styles of mattresses.

Extra 10 percent off beds, dining sets, power-reclining sectionals and other furniture.

70 percent off in-stock area rugs.

Overstock

May 16 to May 29

Overstock has already begun its annual Memorial Day sale, offering deals on more than 750,000 products. Highlights include:

Up to 70 percent off mattresses and memory foam toppers.

Up to an extra 20 percent off patio furniture.

Up to an extra 20 percent off rugs.

Up to an extra 20 percent off lighting.

Up to an extra 20 percent off dining room, living room and bedroom furniture.

Up to 55 percent off luggage and bags.

Dick's Sporting Goods

Ends May 29

The Dick's Sporting Goods Memorial Day sale was one of the earliest to kick off this year and is expected to run through the holiday weekend. Highlights from the sale include:

Up to $220 off boats, paddleboards and accessories.

Up to 50 percent off fishing gear.

Up to 50 percent off golf gear.

Up to 25 percent off swimwear.

Up to 50 percent off select electronics and accessories.

Up to 25 percent off Nike select shoes and apparel.

Up to 25 percent off select MLB apparel.

25 percent off Yeti stainless drinkware.

25 percent off Eno hammocks.

Buy one, get one 50 percent off select outdoor games.

Buy one, get one 50 percent off board shorts and rash guards.

Bon-Ton Stores

May 24 to May 29

The Bon-Ton department store chain is hosting a Memorial Day sale at all its stores, including Bergner's, Boston Store, Carson's, Elder-Beerman, Herberger's and Younkers. All stores will feature the following deals:

55 percent off mattresses.

Extra 10 percent off mattresses, furniture, rugs and furniture accessories with coupon or promo code MEMFURNIS17.

Up to 60 percent off apparel and accessories for men, women and kids.

Up to an extra 25 percent off sale-price apparel and accessories with coupon or promo code MEMDAY25S17.

Extra 20 percent off Yellow Dot or Black Dot apparel clearance purchase with coupon or promo code MEMDAYYDM17.

$10 off a $25 in-store apparel purchase with coupon.

Office Depot and OfficeMax

May 21 to May 27

Office Depot and OfficeMax are starting and ending their Memorial Day sale early this year. Unlike most major retailers, the office supply company is offering Memorial Day deals in store only. In-store offers include:

Sale pricing on all PCs.

25 percent off all mobile accessories.

Up to 40 percent off office furniture.

Free delivery on all sale-price furniture and seating.

Special offers on school and office supplies.
